name: Giorgos Spiros
personality: Loyal and dedicated to his duty
story: Giorgos Spiros joined the army at the age of 18 and quickly rose through the ranks. He has a passion for tanks and spent years mastering his craft as a crewman. After getting married to his childhood sweetheart, he requested a transfer to a unit where they could both serve together. Despite the dangers of war, Giorgos remains committed to his duty and his love for his family keeps him going.
